UDAYSHRI Y 
972-503-6390 | Yudayshri3@gmail.com  
Professional Summary 
▪ Over 8 years of experience in Automation, Configuration and Deployment on Clouds and Data Centers. Worked as the 
Cloud Engineer, DevOps Engineer, Site Reliability Engineer, Build/Release Associate and worked on 
GCP/Azure/AWS and Linux/Windows/Ubuntu Administration.  
▪ Designed, configured, maintained and managed GCP Virtual datacenter cloud computing platform which hosted 
Enterprise applications and used compute engine, GKE, Stackdriver, Cloud Functions, Cloud storage, Cloud SQL, 
Cloud Load Balancing, BigQuery & other tools for various operations. 
▪ Worked in Azure Development worked on Azure web application, Azure Blob Storage, App Services, Azure SQL 
Database, Azure Virtual Machines, Azure AD, Azure DNS, Azure VPN Gateway and Notification Hub. 
▪ Worked with AWS Cloud services like EC2, VPC, Vnet, IAM, DynamoDB, EMR, ECS, Auto-Scaling, S3, 
CloudFront, and Elasticsearch.

▪ Worked with AWS Cloud services like EC2, VPC, Vnet, IAM, DynamoDB, EMR, ECS, Auto-Scaling, S3, 
CloudFront, and Elasticsearch. 
▪ Design and implementation of containerization technology (Kubernetes and Docker) on to the GCP, Azure & AWS 
cloud and automated the process of deploying app containers onto the GKE, Azure cluster (AKS) and EKS. 
▪ Integrated and Orchestrated GitHub Actions/Azure Pipelines /Jenkins using configuration management tool such as 
Ansible. 
▪ Worked on CI/CD systems on Kubernetes/AKS/EKS/GKE container environments for CI/CD systems to build and test 
and deploy deliver highly available and fault-tolerant apps. 
▪ Designed CFT's, ARM Templates, Terraform scripts to create AWS, Azure and GCP Infrastructure. 
▪ Developed Terraform templates, Azure Pipelines, Kubernetes Engine to provision and maintain cloud (AWS, Azure, 
GCP) infrastructures. 
▪ Worked with Ansible role creation and Terraform-based Ansible playbook deployment in AWS.

GCP) infrastructures. 
▪ Worked with Ansible role creation and Terraform-based Ansible playbook deployment in AWS. 
▪ Worked on provisioning databases like Amazon RDS, Azure SQL Database, Cloud SQL, DynamoDB, Azure 
CosmosDB, and Cloud Storage. 
▪ Worked on utilizing artifact repository managers like JFrog, cloud Repo and Azure Artifacts for Maven builds, as 
well as build management tools like Maven and Gradle for the creation of deployable assets (jar, war) from source 
code. 
▪ Experienced with log monitoring tools like Syslog, Splunk, Nagios, Dynatrace, ELK, Prometheous, Grafana, Cloud 
Watch, Azure Devops, and App Dynamics. 
▪ Worked with ticketing & Project Management tools like JIRA, Azure Devops, and ServiceNow. 
▪ Worked on Agile Methodology and monitored and maintained the development and production. 
▪ Administered and maintained Atlassian products like JIRA and Confluence.

configuration

any Error

Autoscaling of Deployments 
▪ Worked with monitoring tools like Prometheus and Grafana

abnormal anomalies within app, deployment, server/host issues

schemes

abnormal anomalies within app, deployment, server/host issues

GitHub Actions, Python, Terraform, ArgoCD, CloudCDN, GKE, Prometheus and Grafana.
